ED_DecisionText: At its 45th plenary meeting, on 5 December 2018, the General Assembly, by a recorded vote of 181 to 0, with 2 abstentions , on the recommendation of the First Committee , the General Assembly,  recalling its resolution 71/67 of 5 December 2016 and its decision 72/514 of 4 December 2017, and noting that the group of governmental experts on nuclear disarmament verification has commenced its work, decided to include in the provisional agenda of its seventy-fourth session, under the item entitled “General and complete disarmament”, the sub-item entitled “Nuclear disarmament verification”.
